title: Bobby’s Mailbag + TV Show Actor Game + Do You Tip The Kitchen? + Your Calls & More!
itunes:title: Bobby’s Mailbag + TV Show Actor Game + Do You Tip The Kitchen? + Your Calls & More!
description:
We got an email from a listener who is looking to propose to his GF, the problem – should he propose with his great grandmothers ring even if it’s not the style she wants? Got a couple fun games on today’s show, at a restaurant do you tip the kitchen as well as the server? Plus some Tell Me Something Good stories & more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
